DOC.brief_summary: PCSK9 ( Proprotein convertase subtilisin kexin type 9 ) play key role LDL-cholesterol ( LDLC ) metabolism inhibit LDL receptor ( LDLR ) post-transcriptional level . PCSK9 loss function mutation associate decreased LDLC level cardiovascular protection . In context , development pharmacological inhibitor PCSK9 , association statin treatment , represent major therapeutic issue LDLC modulation . It previously show PCSK9 plasmatic concentration correlate plasmatic LDLC , TG glucose concentration . However , data available predictive value PCSK9 plasmatic level concern coronary disease severity . The main objective study determine whether plasmatic PCSK9 concentration link coronary damage severity patient acute coronary syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Relevance Plasma PCSK9 Concentration Biomarker Acute Coronary Syndrome .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 18 year old Acute coronary syndrome ( ST+ ST ) 2 group patient : statin , without statin treatment Exclusion criterion : Patient cancer last 5 year cancer progress Patient severe infection progress Hepatic failure ( TP < 50 % ) Severe kidney failure Patient unable give consent study
